description: I was an engineering intern for the EBIA team at Dell during my final semester. This program aims to leverage Artificial Intelligence for data personalization. I was primarily working on the project 'JARVIS,' a chatbot for sales data. My tasks included:
tasks: Developing emailing feature of specific messages and alerts and integrating it with the chatbot.
Developing and enhancing the chatbot to be multi-lingual (Portuguese and French), increasing the audience base by 40%.
Experimenting and developing methods for automated testing of the RASA chatbot.
Enhancing the NLU and training corpus, raising the model's performance by 20%, thereby improving customer satisfaction.
Driving a proof of concept for the Dell.com website and presenting it to stakeholders, deriving meaningful insights.
